verses.text: Rejoice in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, O ye righteous: for* praise is comely for the upright.
Praise the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and* an instrument of ten strings.
Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.
For the word of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* right; and all his works are done* in truth.
He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**.+ 33.5 goodness: or, mercy*
By the word of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.
Let all the earth fear the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
For he spake, and it was done;* he commanded, and it stood fast.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.+ 33.10 bringeth: Heb. maketh frustrate*
The counsel of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.+ 33.11 to allâ€¦: Heb. to generation and generation*
Blessed is* the nation whose God is* the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; and* the people whom* he hath chosen for his own inheritance.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.
From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.
He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.
There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.
An horse is* a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any* by his great strength.
Behold, the eye of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.
Our soul waiteth for the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: he is* our help and our shield.
For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.
Let thy mercy, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
